div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1090 Phanagoria environs (near mod. Sen- naia), Taman' Peninsula, Krasnodar Ter- ritory, RSFSR, 1879 Burial: c. 275-225 B.C. Contents: c. 100 AE. Under amphora frags.
